articles.title: Fitch Ratings downgrade: Is panic warranted in the markets? - The Economic Times
articles.description: As an investor in Indian equity markets, you must not fret over the US downgrade by Fitch and focus on stocks that you own in your portfolio over anything else. Make sure that they are fundamentally sound and hold them with patience.

articles.title: At Rs 16,884 crore, SBI posts highest quarterly profit - The Economic Times
articles.description: Net profit more than doubled year-on-year to a high of ₹16,884 crore in the quarter ended June 2023, beating Bloomberg's ₹14,949-crore estimate. The bank had turned in a net profit of ₹6,068 crore in the corresponding period last year.
